yup.min: The value must be greater or equal to {{min}}
yup.max: The value must be less or equal to {{max}}
yup.minLength: The value must have at least {{min}} characters
yup.maxLength: The value must have at most {{max}} characters
yup.email: The value must be an email
yup.phone: The value must be a valid phone number

password.lowercase: The password must have at least one lowercase letter
password.uppercase: The password must have at least one uppercase letter
password.number: The password must have at least one number
password.special: The password must have at least one special character

navbar.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
